name: creaticcancerchip-ccc-
description: Pancreatic cancer, specifically Pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (PDAC) is an extremely harmful disease that has a survival rate of ~10% after 5 years of being diagnosed [1]. It is important that clinicians are able to diagnose the disease as early as possible for effective treatment. There are no useful biomarkers for detection in its the cancer's early stages; **however,** a recent study has found a promising panel of biomarkers for earlier detection using urine analysis [1].
